name: NO RELOADING: Survival Trials
description:
NO RELOADING: Survival Trials is a stunt-focused shooter with rogue-lite mechanics, playable in single-player or asymmetrical multiplayer with Streamer Mode.

Shoot, slide, wall-run, somersault, and more through randomly generated arenas, picking up weapons and upgrade orbs along the way, stylishly slaying every simulant in your way!

Invent new stylish maneuvers, unlocking whole new playstyles, expanding your options as you dive deeper into the Survival Trials.

Features

  • Stylish, Cinematic Combat: Dive, slide, wall-run, somersault, throw, and more as you revel in slow-motion, perfecting your badassery.
  • It Pays To Be Cool: Choose from hundreds of combinations of stunts and upgrades; the more stylish your combat, the longer you survive... literally!
  • Bigger, Badder, Baddies: Face off against Duke's varied relentless hordes as you traverse eras from classic gaming and action movies!
  • NO RELOADING: Forget that reload button! Toss your old guns and use your over-powered tractor beam arms to take your foes' weapons! Or just... throw a crate like a cannon ball! Trust us, it feels good!
  • STREAMER MODE: Give viewers Duke's dungeon master powers, enabling them to help the player with weapons and upgrades, or sabotage them with enemies and other devious tactics!
